dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S2581 IS: To reauthorize the National Sea Grant College Program.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Cantwell (for herself, Mr. Wicker, Ms. Blunt Rochester, and Mr. Sullivan) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation

form.official-title: To reauthorize the National Sea Grant College Program.

section.header: Authorization of appropriations for National Sea Grant College Program
section.text: Section 212(a) of the National Sea Grant College Program Act (33 U.S.C. 1131(a)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking this title and all that follows through (E) and inserting this title; and
by striking for fiscal year 2025 and inserting for each of fiscal years 2025 through 2031; and
in the paragraph heading, by striking for fiscal years 2021 through 2025; and
in the matter preceding subparagraph (A), by striking fiscal years 2021 through 2025 and inserting fiscal years 2025 through 2031.
